info.name: server_username
info.description: The username of an account on the server that the BladeLogic app server resides on.

info.name: server_password
info.description: The password of an account on the server that the BladeLogic app server resides on.

info.name: server_domain
info.description: The domain of an account on the server that the BladeLogic app server resides on.

info.name: bladelogic_username
info.description: The username of a BladeLogic account that can run the proper CLI commands.

info.name: bladelogic_password
info.description: The password of a BladeLogic account that can run the proper CLI commands.

info.name: bladelogic_role
info.description: The role that the BladeLogic account will assume to run the proper CLI commands.

info.name: app_server
info.description: The location of the BladeLogic App Server that commands will be run against.

info.name: self-signed_cert
info.description: If the Certificate that you are using for verification is self-signed, then input 'true'. If it is not, input 'false'.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
